Education

Seattle Pacific University: September 2000 - August 2004.

  • Double Major: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Bachelor of Arts in Music.
  • Cumulative GPA: 3.94; Major GPA: 3.99 (Computer Science) and 4.0 (Music)
  • Graduated as a member of the University Scholars program.

Examples of My Work

I’ve written and maintain several gems:

  • VCR: Record your test suite’s HTTP interactions and replay them during future test runs for fast, deterministic, accurate tests. Featured on the ruby 5 podcast.
  • Mail Safe: Keep your actionmailer emails from escaping into the wild during development. Featured on the ruby 5 podcast.
  • Null DB: An ActiveRecord null database adapter for greater speed and isolation in unit tests. (Avdi Grimm originally wrote it; I’m the current maintainer).
  • A few smaller projects, including Column Timestamps, Email Blacklist and Test Benchmarker.

I’ve also contributed to numerous projects, including:

  • RSpec core, expectations, mocks and rails
  • Bundler
  • WebMock
  • Reportable

See my github profile for a complete and current list.
